valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 28 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 29 Nov 2025

Southwesterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9, becoming cyclonic 4 to 6, increasing 7 at times later.

Squally showers.

Good, occasionally poor.
